column4: you have at least one partition now... you can't not have a partition
: so how to backup the chat logs then? :(
stick them all in a folder, burn them to DVD
dvd can be substituted for flash drive, whatever depending on how much space you have
ah, i see
you want to hit control-H in nautilus
hidden files (aka "dotfiles") are commonly used for preferences and similar things for the sake of making browsing sane
: im in File browser. all I see is bin/var/boot/cdrom etc..no pidgin
you need to be in /home
/home/jigp for instance
: okay I am in /home/jigp and when I hit cntrl+h nothing happen
where by "jigp" i mean your actual username on your computer
yeah my actual account
are you absolutely sure that you're in your home directory and you see things like Desktop and similar folders?
: yah 100% sureness
in Nautilus do view -> Show Hidden Files
: I am in Dolphin and I don't see Nautilus there
doh
i assumed you were using nautilus since it's the default ubuntu file browser
i imagine there's a way for Dolphin to show dotfiles as well
ok I see hidden files now
